summary: Implements a two‑qubit controlled‑U gate that applies a generic single‑qubit rotation (θ, φ, λ) with an optional global phase γ to the target qubit when the control qubit is in the |1⟩ state, exposing its matrix form and integration with Qiskit circuits.
business_intent: Provides a modular, parameterised quantum gate for building and simulating quantum algorithms, allowing developers to incorporate controlled rotations with phase control into larger quantum circuits.
